title: Hare's Heart
description: There are many types of sinners in hell. Among them are those beyond salvation, while there are others who have a chance of ascending to heaven. Steve is one of the latter. As a special forces officer, he has done unspeakable evils. Most were nessicary parts of his job, but he loved them enough to end up in hell. Now a fallen angel of hell must guide him towards his redemption and save his wife from sharing his damnation.
author: Darren Harrington
